description:
Learn how to make a professional minecraft server and how to make money out of it. This course covers all that you can imagine. With over 15 lessons, 45+ minutes of videos you can learn how to make a professional server in minecraft. I have 3+ years of experience developing minecraft servers. I will teach you how to make the best quality servers in no time. If you play Minecraft and you want to make a server this course will be ideal for you.

This course covers :

  • Making a minecraft server
  • Port Forwarding your server
  • Learning server properties
  • Editing server files
  • Installing and using Plugins
  • Making a website for your server
  • Making in game website for your server
  • Learn how to make money off your server

Good luck Learning ! - "Stay Hungry, Stay foolish" (Steve Jobs)
title: How To Create Your Own Minecraft Server 1.9  (Mac + PC)
